ygData.subject: RE: Another question about the new armor quests
ygData.msgSnippet: If they follow the pattern of the crafted armor, they will be no drop, lore. But that did not stop ppl from selling the loc s of corpses that had these things.
ygData.messageBody:
If they follow the pattern of the crafted armor, they will be no drop, lore.

But that did not stop ppl from selling the loc's of corpses that had these
things.

Sylly

small. The key will be if the quest components are NO DROP.
